channel.title: blogging on Bodacious Blog
channel.description: Recent content in blogging on Bodacious Blog

item.title: About this weblog
item.description: Purpose I’ve started this blog to cast some light on my activities. My goal is to do all of my programming through a terminal, forever, and see where that leads. Topics I’ll be covering: emacs Terminal User Interfaces (TUIs) Tooling Terminal automation Lisps Clojure Common Lisp Natural Language Processing (NLP) Haskell Clojure Linguistics & Semiotics Domain Specific Languages (DSLs) Thanks for reading!
